name: TC-23-P :: Remove a Product from Wishlist

actions.action: Enter the name of the liked product into the "Search" input box.
actions.expectedResult: The product name is successfully entered in the search box.

actions.action: Click the search icon or press the Enter key.
actions.expectedResult: The search results page is loaded and displays the product.

actions.action: Click the activated (color-changed) "heart" icon on the product card.
actions.expectedResult: A success message "Product successfully removed from your wishlist" appears at the top of the page.
